attributes.action: urge Ken Bates to remove the last remnant of the 'living the dream' catastrophe at Leeds United - the present badge worn by the Leeds team.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now we are out of the Red, there is no more fish and no more cars at half time.  I think it is about time we moved away from the era tainted by the derision when we lived the dream!  Let not future glory be sullied by the bunch of Apprentice rejects who wanted a badge reflect our European ventures, done in an European style.  Do I need to further explain?  If it ain’t broke don’t fix it, let’s go back to the yellow Smiley.  Prudent finances our watch words, marching on together.
